external_games.name: Train Simulator: Corris Railway Route Add-On

name: Train Simulator: Corris Railway Route Add-On
summary: The wonderful world of Welsh narrow gauge comes to life in Train Simulator with the recently re-opened Corris Railway. With passenger services long gone and mineral freight in decline, it became less worthwhile for the Great Western Railway to combat the eroding force of the River Dovey (Afor Dyfi).
